name: sgct
description: SGCT is a free cross-platform C++ library for developing OpenGL applications that are
synchronized across a cluster of image generating computers (IGs).  SGCT is designed
to be as simple as possible to use for the developer and targets the use in immersive
real-time applications.  SGCT supports a number of output formats, such as virtual
